short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Watch your videos while not on the viewer page.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension allows you to continue watching YouTube videos when you leave a player page. This small, draggable, persistent viewer makes viewing content while browsing YouTube a breeze.
